mapper.select: select * from prod order by prod_id
select i.warehouse_id, w.warehouse_scale, i.current_quantity, (w.warehouse_scale - i.current_quantity) AS current_scale from inventory i join warehouse w on (i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod (prod_id, prod_name, make_prod_date, prod_quantity, safety_stock_amount, product_type) VALUES (#{prodId}, #{prodName}, #{makeProdDate}, #{prodQuantity}, #{safetyStockAmount}, #{productType})
